title: Fix String Reverse Bug
description:
## Problem

The `solution` function should reverse the input string but has an off-by-one error causing incorrect output.

## Requirements

1. Reverse the input string completely
2. Handle empty strings (return empty)
3. Handle single character strings

## Hints

- Check your loop bounds carefully
- Consider using the standard library's reverse function
- The input is passed as a plain string (already extracted from JSON)
